name: Brick Hill Hub | Version Myst
description:
--- THIS IS THE UNFINISHED VERSION, SO PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS YOU MAY FIND ---

Required Themes:
Brick Hill Dark Mode ~ https://userstyles.org/styles/172113/brick-hill-dark-mode-rock-solid

Warning! Must install **Brick Hill Dark Mode** first in order to use this properly. Once installed Brick Hill Dark Mode, install this theme *Brick Hill Hub* and enable both themes for use on the website Brick Hill.
